org.drip.service.env

Class EnvManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.env.EnvManager

  • public class EnvManager
extends java.lang.Object
    EnvManager sets the environment/connection parameters, and populates the market parameters for the given EOD

      Initializes the logger, the database connections, the day count parameters, and day count objects

      Populates the MarketParams with the closing discount curves, closing credit curves, and other market objects for the given EOD
